info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:19PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Twin Falls County through 345 PM MDT... At 318 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Magic Mountain Ski Area, or 17 miles west of Oakley Reservoir, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Magic Mountain Ski Area around 320 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
